game.name: Dreamcore: Rabbit Hole
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 익숙한 듯 불길하고 상상력을 자극하는 리미널 스페이스를 탐험하세요. 마치 이미 꿨던 꿈처럼.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore liminal spaces that feel eerily familiar and fire the imagination, like a dream you’ve already visited.
